Hello hello, this will be my blog for the random things I see on here.

summary: Looking for a Drarry RP partner
body:
Looking for a Drarry RP partner

Hello there~

Do you RP Drarry? If you are interested in RP-ing Drarry with me, please message me on

Kik: GemCandy

Or

Discord: GemCandy#7668


I mostly RP Bottom!Harry and Top!Draco and I only play Harry. (they are always OOC pretty much, cause it’s an AU)

I love to RP sex scenes in my Drarry as well, so if you want to RP that, please be older than 18 for legal reasons though ^^

I hope to speak you soon~

summary: Wait...can spells bounce off of mirrors??? because this opens up a world of amusing possibilities. people with glasses...
body: Wait…can spells bounce off of mirrors??? because this opens up a world of amusing possibilities. people with glasses occasionally rebounding hexes off their lenses. aurors wearing full-body mirror suits into battle. duels in bathrooms being absolute chaos as no one knows where a spell will end up. wizard criminals running into mirror maze fun houses to escape. paranoid wizards (read: Mad-Eye) having mirrors all over their houses. mirrors being banned in high-security area. the reason breaking a mirror is said to be bad luck is because a mirror could protect a wizard from getting hexed. I have no idea if this actually holds true but it would make sense if spells were made of light, it probably wouldn’t bounce all spells, like those meant for breaking stuff, but it’s gotta be at least a few

reblog.comment: Wait…can spells bounce off of mirrors??? because this opens up a world of amusing possibilities. people with glasses occasionally rebounding hexes off their lenses. aurors wearing full-body mirror suits into battle. duels in bathrooms being absolute chaos as no one knows where a spell will end up. wizard criminals running into mirror maze fun houses to escape. paranoid wizards (read: Mad-Eye) having mirrors all over their houses. mirrors being banned in high-security area. the reason breaking a mirror is said to be bad luck is because a mirror could protect a wizard from getting hexed. I have no idea if this actually holds true but it would make sense if spells were made of light, it probably wouldn’t bounce all spells, like those meant for breaking stuff, but it’s gotta be at least a few

I have no idea if this actually holds true but it would make sense if spells were made of light, it probably wouldn’t bounce all spells, like those meant for breaking stuff, but it’s gotta be at least a few

I have no idea if this actually holds true but it would make sense if spells were made of light, it probably wouldn’t bounce all spells, like those meant for breaking stuff, but it’s gotta be at least a few

summary: Harry Potter House
title: Harry Potter House
body:
Over Spring Break I started the Harry Potter series (finally) and I was wonder what house I would be in so I took the Pottermore test. And I’m a SLYTHERIN. Everyone I have met always said I was a Hufflepuff or Gryffindor. 

xoxo

summary:
Gryffindor: I’ll steal everything you have.
Slytherin: *thinking* You won’t steal my heart.
Gryffindor: You look stunning by the...
body:

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

tags: i rewatched gof and thought of this
summary: Since the Slytherin common room is next to the Black Lake, I’ve always imagined for it to have tall windows like an aquarium...
body:
Since the Slytherin common room is next to the Black Lake, I’ve always imagined for it to have tall windows like an aquarium that can see into the water. We know that during the Triwizard tournament’s second task took place in the Black Lake, it can be assumed that someone had to put the comatose kids (who even thought of that?) at the bottom of the lake. So just imagine relaxing before suddenly seeing four of your professors swimming by, each dragging the seemingly lifeless corpse of a student behind them, tying said students to the bottom of the lake, and leaving them there.

That is all.

summary:
Plot bunny for
adoption (sent me a link so I can read it, and please, if you can, make this
story a non-shipping Gen fic): AU:...
body:
Plot bunny for adoption (sent me a link so I can read it, and please, if you can, make this story a non-shipping Gen fic):

AU:

To save Alphonse, instead of his arm, Edward traded his time, causing his body to stop aging and he was stuck looking like eleven years old for the rest of his life.

caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
